net.sf.jboard.fwk.exception
Class BaseException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          net.sf.jboard.fwk.exception.BaseException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientException, ViewException
public class BaseException
extends java.lang.Exception

This is the common superclass for all application exceptions. This class and its subclasses support the chained exception facility that allows a root cause Throwable to be wrapped by this class or one of its descendants. This class also supports multiple exceptions via the exceptionList field.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Charles Gay
